description: A layered cake with a creamy custard filling and a caramelized sugar topping, combining the flavors of crème brûlée in a cake form.
A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, cocoa powder, and a dusting of chocolate, served chilled.
A light and fluffy cake flavored with vanilla, layered with fresh raspberries or raspberry filling, and often frosted with a creamy vanilla buttercream.
A rich, moist cake made with cocoa powder or melted chocolate, often paired with chocolate frosting for a decadent, indulgent dessert.
A sweet dessert made with layers of fluffy biscuits or sponge cake, fresh strawberries, and whipped cream.
A warm, comforting dessert made with bread soaked in a rich caramel custard, baked until golden, and often drizzled with more caramel sauce.
